com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.threading

Class GameThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.threading.GameThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Animator, LogicManager, Scheduler

    public abstract class GameThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Extension of the thread class used in the engine. A GameThread is a thread in an infinite loop until kill() is called. Within each loop the loop state can either be paused or running.
    Author:
    jlreyes
